definition: (Internet slang) what? (loanword from Japanese 何 なに nani)
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
Narnia, children's fantasy world in stories by C.S. Lewis
The Chronicles of Narnia, children's stories by C.S. Lewis

sentences.english: The referee didn't blow his whistle at all and Nani actually looked at him to check.
sentences.chinese: 裁判沒有吹哨，納尼看着裁判想確認狀況。

sentences.english: Nani's passage to the World Cup with Portugal was plain sailing by comparison with Evra's exertions.
sentences.chinese: 納尼進入世界盃比起埃弗拉來講就順理成章的多。

sentences.english: However, Nani will miss Portugal's trip to Liechtenstein after sustaining a shoulder injury.
sentences.chinese: 不過納尼因爲肩膀受傷不能去國家隊報到了。

sentences.english: Manchester United players celebrate Nani's opening goal. Photograph: Tom Jenkins
sentences.chinese: 曼聯球員慶祝納尼的首開紀錄。

sentences.english: I've played against Giggsy, Ronaldo and Nani.
sentences.chinese: 我曾經碰到過吉格斯，羅納爾多和納尼。

sentences.english: Sir Alex feels Mark Clattenburg's decision to allow Nani's late goal against Tottenham to stand was the correct one.
sentences.chinese: 弗格森爵士覺得裁判判定納尼的進球有效是對的。

sentences.english: Asnani points to plenty of risks in the near term.
sentences.chinese: 阿斯納尼也指出了近期印度所面臨的諸多風險。

sentences.english: Nani is a really funny lad around the dressing room.
sentences.chinese: 納尼在更衣室裏是個非常有意思的球員。

sentences.english: I know there are a number of United fans who had lost faith in Nani.
sentences.chinese: 我知道很多曼聯球迷都對納尼失去了信心。

sentences.english: He tried every means to seduce multimedia Du, but he found multimedia Du love is Nani.
sentences.chinese: 他用盡手段欲引誘繽杜，但他發現繽杜愛的是納尼。
